## Summary

- What is changing and why?

## Type of change
- [ ] feat (new feature)
- [ ] fix (bug fix)
- [ ] docs (documentation only)
- [ ] refactor (no functional change)
- [ ] chore (build, tooling)

## Test plan
- Steps or screenshots showing the change works.

## Checklist
- [ ] I ran tests locally
- [ ] I updated docs if needed
- [ ] I followed the Code of Conduct
